newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Bahrain 91-day treasury bill rate down at 5.53pct.
newsitem.headline: Bahrain 91-day treasury bill rate down at 5.53pct.

text.p: The average yield at this week's tender for ten million dinars of 91-day Bahrain treasury bills edged down to 5.53 percent from 5.55 percent last week, a spokesman for the Bahrain Monetary Agency said.
The average price rose to 98.621 from 98.617 last week and the minimum price accepted was 98.613.
Banks submitted bids for 28.9 million dinars worth of bills, up from 18.95 million dinars the previous week.
The bills are offered on Monday and issued on Wednesday.
